org.graphity.processor.model

Interface ContainerResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.graphity.server.model.LinkedDataResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Container, GlobalResourceBase, ResourceBase, ResourceBase

    public interface ContainerResource
extends org.graphity.server.model.LinkedDataResource
    Interface of container resources. Pages (pagination units) only applies to container resources. SPARQL-based solution modifiers are used to implement pagination.
    Author:
    Martynas Juseviƒçius
    See Also:
    15 Solution Sequences and Modifiers, Linked Data Platform 1.0: Paging

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Boolean getDesc()
      Indicates whether the direction of the ordering is DESC.
      Long getLimit()
      Returns the value of LIMIT query modifier.
      Long getOffset()
      Returns the value of OFFSET query modifier.
      String getOrderBy()
      Returns the name of the variable used by the ORDER BY ordering comparator.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.graphity.server.model.LinkedDataResource

        delete, get, getURI, post, put

    • Method Detail

      • getLimit

        Long getLimit()
        Returns the value of LIMIT query modifier. It indicates the number of resources per page.
        Returns:
        resources per page
        See Also:
        15.5 LIMIT

      • getOffset

        Long getOffset()
        Returns the value of OFFSET query modifier. It indicates the number of resources skipped before the current page.
        Returns:
        number of resources skipped
        See Also:
        15.4 OFFSET

      • getOrderBy

        String getOrderBy()
        Returns the name of the variable used by the ORDER BY ordering comparator. It indicates the ordering of resources in a container and on a page. While SPARQL allows a sequence of multiple variables used as comparators, the processor currently supports only one value.
        Returns:
        variable name or null, if not specified
        See Also:
        15.1 ORDER BY

      • getDesc

        Boolean getDesc()
        Indicates whether the direction of the ordering is DESC. If this method returns true, DESC order modifier is set on the variable indicated by getOrderBy(). Otherwise, no order modifier is set (which equals to ASC).
        Returns:
        true if the order is descending, false otherwise
        See Also:
        15.1 ORDER BY
